title: ROOM RENTAL AGREEMENT (Totally Legalâ„¢ Extended Edition)

key_issues.clause: The Tenant shall pay rent in the amount of SGD 500.00 per month, but the Landlord reserves the right to increase rent by any amount at any time without prior notice.
key_issues.rationale: Landlord reserves the right to increase rent by any amount at any time without prior notice is unfair.
key_issues.recommendation: Negotiate for a reasonable rent increase clause with prior notice.

key_issues.clause: A security deposit of SGD 2000.00 shall be paid, which will not be refunded under any circumstances, including but not limited to the Tenant never actually moving in.
key_issues.rationale: A security deposit of SGD 2000.00 shall be paid, which will not be refunded under any circumstances is unfair and exceeds the industry norm of 2 months' rent.
key_issues.recommendation: Negotiate to reduce deposit to 2 months maximum and ensure refund conditions are fair.

key_issues.clause: Tenant agrees to allow the Landlord unrestricted access to the premises at all hours, including weekends, public holidays, and during the Tenant's sleep.
key_issues.rationale: Tenant agrees to allow the Landlord unrestricted access to the premises at all hours is a violation of privacy.
key_issues.recommendation: Ensure entry notice clause is present and reasonable (e.g., 24 hours notice).

key_issues.clause: Utilities shall be borne entirely by the Tenant, including electricity, water, gas, air, an theoretical concepts such as 'hope' and 'dreams'.
key_issues.rationale: Utilities shall be borne entirely by the Tenant, including electricity, water, gas, air, an theoretical concepts such as 'hope' and 'dreams' is unreasonable.
key_issues.recommendation: Confirm utilities terms are clear and reasonable.

key_issues.clause: The Tenant is responsible for all repairs, including structural damage, natural disasters, and any cosmic phenomena affecting the unit.
key_issues.rationale: The Tenant is responsible for all repairs, including structural damage, natural disasters, and any cosmic phenomena affecting the unit is unfair.
key_issues.recommendation: Negotiate a reasonable cap for minor repairs and exclude structural damage and natural disasters.

key_issues.clause: Subletting is prohibited unless the Landlord personally profits from it. Any sublet profits not reported to the Landlord will be punishable by immediate eviction and forfeiture of all belongings.
key_issues.rationale: Subletting is prohibited unless the Landlord personally profits from it is unfair.
key_issues.recommendation: Confirm subletting terms are clear and fair.

key_issues.clause: Pets are not allowed, except for those owned by the Landlord. Tenant is required to feed, walk, and groom said pets.
key_issues.rationale: Pets are not allowed, except for those owned by the Landlord. Tenant is required to feed, walk, and groom said pets is unreasonable.

key_issues.clause: The Tenant waives all legal rights, including the right to complain, negotiate, or seek fairness. All disputes shall be resolved exclusively by the Landlord's personal opinion.
key_issues.rationale: The Tenant waives all legal rights, including the right to complain, negotiate, or seek fairness is illegal and unenforceable.

key_issues.clause: The Agreement shall last for 99 years or until the Tenant's spirit is broken, whichever comes first.
key_issues.rationale: The Agreement shall last for 99 years or until the Tenant's spirit is broken is unreasonable and exploitative.
key_issues.recommendation: Negotiate for a standard tenancy period (e.g., 1-2 years).

key_issues.clause: Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by the Laws of Singapore, as well as the arbitrary mood swings of the Landlord.
key_issues.rationale: Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by the Laws of Singapore, as well as the arbitrary mood swings of the Landlord is illegal.
key_issues.recommendation: Remove the part about the arbitrary mood swings of the Landlord.

recommendations: Negotiate for a reasonable rent increase clause with prior notice.
Negotiate to reduce deposit to 2 months maximum and ensure refund conditions are fair.
Ensure entry notice clause is present and reasonable (e.g., 24 hours notice).
Confirm utilities terms are clear and reasonable.
Negotiate a reasonable cap for minor repairs and exclude structural damage and natural disasters.
Confirm subletting terms are clear and fair.
Negotiate for a standard tenancy period (e.g., 1-2 years).
Remove the part about the arbitrary mood swings of the Landlord.
